titleStmt.title: The Kings letter intercepted coming from Oxford with a ioyful and true relation of th[e?] great victory obtained by Sir Thomas Fairfax, Sir William Brereton, and Sir VVilliam Fairfax, against the Irish at the raising of the siege at Nantwich on Friday last January 26, 1643 ...
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
Fairfax, William, Sir, 1609-1644.
Brereton, William, Sir, 1604-1661.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
